explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses a modified version of support vector machines, which is a machine learning technique.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper focuses on support vector machines, which are a type of supervised learning algorithm used for regression tasks.
explanations.regression: The paper applies the modified support vector machines to financial time series forecasting, which is a regression problem.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper proposes a modified version of support vector machines (C-ascending support vector machine) for financial time series forecasting.
explanations.SVM: SVM is the acronym for support vector machine, which is the main focus of the paper.
